mgconfig

Basic Example

This example shows:

  • accessing a configuration value

Prepare the needed configuration definition file to run this example:

  • “config_def_1_basic.yaml” (See the Config Definition File - basic example section)

Run the following code example:

1# import from mgconfig
2from mgconfig import Configuration
3
4# configuration object creation
5config = Configuration('config_defs/config_def_1_basic.yaml')
6
7# alternative access posibility:
8print(f"Test configuration value: {config.app_test}")

Further Reading

See the API Reference section for the full API reference.
